name: blink
notes: Quick-casting will cause you to teleport towards your fountain.
lore: The fabled dagger used by the fastest assassin ever to walk the lands.
desc: Active: Blink - Teleport to a target point up to 1200 units away.  If damage is taken from an enemy hero, Blink Dagger cannot be used for 3 seconds.

name: blades_of_attack
lore: The damage of these small, concealable blades should not be underestimated.
attrib: + 9 Damage

name: broadsword
lore: The classic weapon of choice for knights, this blade is sturdy and reliable for slaying enemies.
attrib: + 18 Damage

name: chainmail
lore: A medium weave of metal chains.
attrib: + 5 Armor

name: claymore
lore: A sword that can cut through armor, it's a commonly chosen first weapon for budding swordsmen.
attrib: + 21 Damage

name: helm_of_iron_will
lore: The helmet of a legendary warrior who fell in battle.
attrib:
+ 5 Armor
+ 3 HP Regeneration

name: javelin
lore: A rather typical spear that can sometimes pierce through an enemy's armor when used to attack.
attrib:
+ 21 Damage
CHANCE TO PIERCE: 20%
PIERCE DAMAGE: 40
desc: Passive: Pierce - Grants a chance to deal bonus damage.

name: mithril_hammer
lore: A hammer forged of pure mithril.
attrib: + 24 Damage

name: platemail
lore: Thick metal plates that protect the entire upper body. Avoid dropping on feet.
attrib: + 10 Armor

name: quarterstaff
lore: A basic staff that allows you to strike quickly.
attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 10 Attack Speed

name: quelling_blade
notes: Cannot carry more than one.
lore: The axe of a fallen gnome, it allows you to effectively maneuver the forest.
attrib:
MELEE BONUS: 32%
RANGED BONUS: 12%
desc:
Active: Destroy Tree/Ward - Destroy a target tree, or deals 100 damage to a ward.
Passive: Quell - Gives bonus attack damage against non-hero units, depending on the type of hero you are.

name: ring_of_protection
lore: A glimmering ring that defends its bearer.
attrib: + 2 Armor

name: gauntlets
lore: Studded leather gloves that add brute strength.
attrib: + 3 Strength

name: slippers
lore: Light boots made from spider skin that tingles your senses.
attrib: + 3 Agility

name: mantle
lore: A beautiful sapphire mantle worn by generations of queens.
attrib: + 3 Intelligence

name: branches
lore: A seemingly ordinary branch, its ironlike qualities are bestowed upon the bearer.
attrib: + 1 All Attributes

name: belt_of_strength
lore: A valued accessory for improving vitality.
attrib: + 6 Strength

name: boots_of_elves
lore: A tensile fabric often used for its light weight and ease of movement.
attrib: + 6 Agility

name: robe
lore: This robe corrupts the soul of the user, but provides wisdom in return.
attrib: + 6 Intelligence

name: circlet
lore: An elegant circlet designed for human princesses.
attrib: + 2 All Attributes

name: ogre_axe
lore: You grow stronger just by holding it.
attrib: + 10 Strength

name: blade_of_alacrity
lore: A long blade imbued with time magic.
attrib: + 10 Agility

name: staff_of_wizardry
lore: A staff of magical powers passed down from the eldest mages.
attrib: + 10 Intelligence

name: ultimate_orb
lore: A mystical orb containing the essence of life.
attrib: + 10 All Attributes

name: gloves
lore: A pair of magical gloves that seems to render weapons weightless.
attrib: + 15 Attack Speed

name: lifesteal
lore: A mask that drains the energy of those caught in its gaze.
attrib: LIFESTEAL: 15%
desc:
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Morbid Mask is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: ring_of_regen
notes: Ring of Regen is shareable.
lore: This ring is considered a good luck charm among the Gnomes.
attrib: + 2 HP Regeneration

name: sobi_mask
notes: Sage's Mask is shareable.
lore: A mask commonly used by mages and warlocks for various rituals.
attrib: + 50% Mana Regeneration

name: boots
lore: Fleet footwear, increasing movement.
attrib: + 50 Movement Speed
desc: Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: gem
notes:
Disabled while on a courier.
Gives vision in a 1100 radius.
desc: Passive: True Sight - Gives the ability to see invisible units and wards. Drops on death, but cannot be destroyed.

name: cloak
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
lore: A cloak made of a magical material that works to dispel any magic cast on it.
attrib: + 15% Spell Resistance
desc: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

name: talisman_of_evasion
lore: A necklace that allows you to anticipate enemy attacks.
attrib: + 25% Evasion

name: cheese
notes: Cheese is shareable.
lore: Made from the milk of a long lost Furbolg vendor, it restores the vitality of those who taste it.
attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 2500
MANA RESTORED: 1000
desc: Use: Instantly restores health and mana.

name: magic_stick
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
attrib: RESTORE PER CHARGE: 15
desc: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 10) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

name: magic_wand
notes:
Gains charges for spells cast by visible enemies in 1200 range.
Certain abilities and item abilities will not add charges.
lore: A simple wand used to channel magic energies, it is favored by apprentice wizards and great warlocks alike.
attrib:
+ 3 All Attributes
RESTORE PER CHARGE: 15
desc: Active: Energy Charge - Gains charges (max 15) based on enemies using abilities in a nearby area.  When activated, it restores health and mana based on the number of charges stored.

name: ghost
notes:
Ends if you become magic immune, and will have no effect if you are already magic immune.
Shares cooldown with Ethereal Blade.
lore: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.
attrib:
+ 7 All Attributes
GHOST DURATION: 4
desc: Active: Ghost Form - Enter ghost form and become unable to attack or be attacked, but take -40% extra magic damage. Using a Teleport Scroll dispels Ghost Form.

name: clarity
lore: Clear water that enhances the ability to meditate.
attrib:
DURATION: 30
MANA RESTORED: 100
desc: Use: Restores mana on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: flask
lore: A magical salve that can quickly mend even the deepest of wounds.
attrib:
DURATION: 10
HEALTH RESTORED: 400
desc: Use: Regenerate - Restores HP on the target unit over time.  If the unit is attacked, the effect is lost.

name: dust
notes: Places a buff on enemy units in the area that prevents them from becoming invisible.
attrib:
DURATION: 12
RADIUS: 1050
SLOW: 15%
desc: Use: Reveal - Reveals and slows invisible Heroes in a nearby area.

name: bottle
notes: Bottle is shareable.
lore: An old bottle that survived the ages, the contents placed inside become enchanted.
attrib:
HEALTH RESTORED: 135
MANA RESTORED: 70
DURATION: 3
desc:
Use: Regenerate - Restores HP and Mana over time. Effect is lost if unit is attacked. Empty Bottle refills near town fountain. You can also store runes in the bottle, to save for later use. After 2 minutes, stored Runes will be activated. If Bottle is empty, it causes a courier to move 30% slower.

Hold Control to use your Bottle on an allied hero.

name: ward_observer
desc:
Use: Places an Observer Ward to give sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 7 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Observer Ward to an allied hero.

name: ward_sentry
desc:
Use: Places a Sentry Ward to give True Sight of the surrounding area. Lasts 4 minutes.

Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.

name: tango
lore: Forage to survive on the battlefield.
attrib:
DURATION: 16
HEALTH RESTORED: 115
desc: Use: Eat Tree - Consume a tree to restore HP over time. Comes with 3 charges.

name: courier
lore: Losing the donkey is punishable by death.
desc: Creature that carries items to and from your base.

name: tpscroll
desc: Use: Teleport - Teleports you to a target friendly building.

name: travel_boots
notes: Shares cooldown with Town Portal Scrolls.
lore: Winged boots that grant omnipresence.
attrib: + 100 Movement Speed
desc:
Active: Teleport - Teleports you to an allied non-hero unit or structure.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: phase_boots
lore: Boots that allow the wearer to travel between the ether.
attrib:
PHASE DURATION: 4
PHASE MOVE BOOST: 16%
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 24 Damage
desc:
Active: Phase - Gives increased movement speed and lets you move through units. Phase is cancelled upon using another item or ability.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: demon_edge
lore: One of the oldest weapons forged by the Demon-Smith Abzidian, it killed its maker when he tested its edge.
attrib: + 46 Damage

name: eagle
lore: Capturing the majestic call of an eagle, this mystical horn brings limitless dexterity to those who hear it.
attrib: + 25 Agility

name: reaver
lore: A massive axe capable of tearing whole mountains down.
attrib: + 25 Strength

name: relic
lore: An ancient weapon that often turns the tides of war.
attrib: + 60 Damage

name: hyperstone
lore: A mystical, carved stone that boosts the fervor of the holder.
attrib: + 55 Attack Speed

name: ring_of_health
notes: Ring of Health is shareable.
lore: A shiny ring found beneath a fat halfling's corpse.
attrib: + 5 HP Regeneration

name: void_stone
notes: Void Stone is shareable.
lore: Jewelry that was once used to channel nether realm magic, this ring pulses with energy.
attrib: + 100% Mana Regeneration

name: mystic_staff
lore: Enigmatic staff made of only the most expensive crystals.
attrib: + 25 Intelligence

name: energy_booster
lore: This lapis gemstone is commonly added to the collection of wizards seeking to improve their presence in combat.
attrib: + 250 Mana

name: point_booster
lore: A perfectly formed amethyst that nourishes body and mind when held.
attrib:
+ 150 Mana
+ 200 Health

name: vitality_booster
lore: A ruby gemstone that has been passed down through generations of warrior kin.
attrib: + 250 Health

name: power_treads
lore: A pair of tough-skinned boots that change to meet the demands of the wearer.
attrib:
+ 50 Movement Speed
+ 8 Selected Attribute
+ 30 Attack Speed
desc:
Active: Switch Attribute - Changes selected attribute between Strength, Agility and Intelligence.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: hand_of_midas
notes: The gold given is reliable gold (you do not get the normal creep bounty).
lore: Preserved through unknown magical means, the Hand of Midas is a weapon of greed, sacrificing animals to line the owner's pockets.
attrib: + 30 Attack Speed
desc: Active: Transmute - Kills a non-hero target for 190 gold and 2.5x experience.  Cannot be used on Ancients.

name: oblivion_staff
lore: Deceptively hidden as an ordinary quarterstaff, it is actually very powerful, much like the Eldritch who originally possessed it.
attrib:
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 10 Attack Speed
+ 15 Damage
+ 75% Mana Regeneration

name: pers
notes: Perseverance is shareable.
lore: A gem that grants heart to the bearer.
attrib:
+ 10 Damage
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 125% Mana Regeneration

name: poor_mans_shield
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: A busted old shield that seems to block more than it should.
attrib:
MELEE BLOCK: 20
RANGED BLOCK: 10
BLOCK CHANCE: 60%
+ 6 Agility
desc: Passive: Damage Block - Blocks physical attack damage, depending on the type of hero you are.  Poor Man's Shield will always block attacks from enemy Heroes, but has a chance to block damage from creeps.

name: bracer
lore: The bracer is a common choice to toughen up defenses and increase longevity.
attrib:
+ 6 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage

name: wraith_band
lore: A circlet with faint whispers echoing about it.
attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 6 Agility
+ 3 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage

name: null_talisman
lore: A small gemstone attached to several chains.
attrib:
+ 3 Strength
+ 3 Agility
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 3 Damage

name: mekansm
notes: Restore does not affect units that have been affected by Restore in the last 25 seconds.
lore: A glowing jewel formed out of assorted parts that somehow fit together perfectly.
attrib:
+ 5 All Attributes
+ 5 Armor
BONUS HP REGEN: 4
desc:
Active: Restore - Heals 250 HP and gives +2 armor in an area.
Passive: Mekansm Aura - Bonus HP Regen in an area.

Multiple instances of Mekansm Aura do not stack.

name: vladmir
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: An eerie mask that is haunted with the malice of a fallen vampire.
attrib:
AURA LIFESTEAL: 16%
AURA BONUS DAMAGE: 15%
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.8
+ 2 HP Regeneration
desc:
Passive: Vladmir's Aura - Grants a variety of bonuses to nearby allies. Lifesteal bonuses from Vladmir's Aura only affect melee units.

Multiple instances of Vladmir's Aura do not stack.

name: flying_courier
desc: Fast flying creature that carries items to and from your base.  Requires Animal Courier.

name: buckler
lore: A powerful shield that imbues the bearer with the strength of heroes past, it is capable of protecting entire armies in battle.
attrib:
+ 5 Armor
+ 2 All Attributes
desc: Active: Armor Bonus - Gives +2 to all nearby allied units.  Lasts 25 seconds on heroes, 30 seconds on units.

name: ring_of_basilius
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: Ring given as a reward to the greatest mages.
attrib:
+ 6 Damage
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
+ 1 Armor
desc:
Passive: Basilius Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Basilius Aura do not stack.

name: pipe
notes:
Does not affect units that have been affected by Barrier in the last 50 seconds.
Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
lore: A powerful artifact of mysterious origin, it creates barriers against magical forces.
attrib:
+ 11 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
desc:
Active: Barrier - Gives nearby friendly units a shield that blocks 400 spell damage.

Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

name: urn_of_shadows
lore: Contains the ashes of powerful demons.
attrib:
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
+ 6 Strength
URN HEAL: 400
DURATION: 8
URN DAMAGE: 150
desc:
Gains charges every time an enemy hero dies within 1400 units. Only the closest Urn to the dying hero will gain a charge.
Active: Soul Release - Heals HP over time for friendly units, but deals damage over time for enemy units. The healing effect is lost if the affected unit takes damage from an enemy hero or tower.

name: headdress
lore: Creates a soothing aura that restores allies in battle.
attrib:
+ 2 All Attributes
BONUS REGEN: 3
desc:
Passive: Regeneration Aura - Restores HP to allies in a 750 unit radius.

Multiple instances of Regeneration Aura do not stack.

name: sheepstick
notes:
Instantly destroys illusions.
The target will have a base movement speed of 100, but buffs granting maximum movement speed won't be disabled.
Hex disables damage block and evasion.
lore: The most guarded relic among the cult of Vyse, it is the most coveted weapon among magi.
attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Agility
+ 35 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
desc: Active: Hex - Turns a target unit into a harmless critter for 3.5 seconds. Destroys illusions.

name: orchid
notes: Amplified damage is dealt at the end of the duration as magical damage.
lore: A garnet rod constructed from the essence of a fire demon.
attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 30 Attack Speed
+ 30 Damage
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
desc: Active: Soul Burn - Silences target unit for 5.0 seconds and amplifies the damage it takes by 30.0%.

name: cyclone
notes: You cannot cyclone allies.
lore: A mysterious scepter passed down through the ages, its disruptive winds can be used for good or evil.
attrib:
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 40 Movement Speed
desc:
Active: Cyclone - Target unit is swept up in a cyclone for 2.5 seconds, and is invulnerable.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple Eul's Scepters do not stack.

name: force_staff
notes:
Quick-cast will cause you to use Force on yourself.
Force Staff doesn't interrupt the target's actions.
Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere or Black Hole.
lore: Allows you to manipulate others, for good or evil.
attrib:
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 3 HP Regeneration
desc: Active: Force - Pushes any target unit 600 units in the direction it is facing.  Double click to self-cast.

name: dagon
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

name: necronomicon
lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
attrib:
+ 15/21/24 Intelligence
+ 8/12/16 Strength
desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.

name: ultimate_scepter
lore: The scepter of a wizard with demigod-like powers.
attrib:
+ 10 All Attributes
+ 200 Health
+ 150 Mana
desc: Passive: Ultimate Upgrade - Upgrades the ultimates of certain heroes.

name: refresher
lore: A powerful artifact created for wizards.
attrib:
+ 5 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
+ 40 Damage
+ 6 Intelligence
desc: Active: Reset Cooldowns - Resets the cooldowns of all your items and abilities.

name: assault
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Assault Cuirass, Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: Forged in the depths of the nether reaches, this hellish mail provides an army with increased armor and attack speed.
attrib:
+ 35 Attack Speed
+ 10 Armor
AURA ATTACK SPEED: 20
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 5
ARMOR REDUCTION: 5
desc:
Passive: Assault Aura - Grants attack speed and armor to nearby allied units, and decreases armor for nearby enemies.

Multiple instances of Assault Aura do not stack.

name: heart
lore: Preserved heart of an extinct monster, it bolsters the bearer's fortitude.
attrib:
+ 40 Strength
+ 300 Health
HEALTH RESTORED: 2%
desc:
Passive: Health Regeneration - Restores a percentage of max health per second.

This ability is disabled if damage is taken from an enemy Hero or Roshan within the last 4 seconds if your hero is melee or 6 seconds if your hero is ranged.

name: black_king_bar
notes:
Cannot be sold.
Using Black King Bar may remove some positive buffs.
lore: A powerful staff imbued with the strength of giants.
attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 24 Damage
DURATION: 10/9/8/7/6/5/4
desc: Active: Avatar - Grants magic immunity.  Duration and cooldown decrease with each use.  Some Ultimate abilities are able to disable through Black King Bar.

name: aegis
lore: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.
desc: Passive: Reincarnation - Brings you to life with full health and mana 5.0 seconds after you die, at the location where you died. Reincarnation must be used within 6 minutes or Aegis of the Immortal disappears.

name: shivas_guard
notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
attrib:
+ 30 Intelligence
+ 15 Armor
AURA ATTACK SLOW: 40
BLAST DAMAGE: 200
BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4
desc:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that does 200 damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces attack speed on enemies.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.

name: bloodstone
notes: Only the first Bloodstone will gain charges.
lore: The Bloodstone's bright ruby color is unmistakable on the battlefield, as the owner seems to have infinite vitality and spirit.
attrib:
+ 500 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 9 HP Regeneration
+ 200% Mana Regeneration
desc:
Active: Pocket Suicide - Instantly commits suicide.

Passive: Bloodpact - Starts with 8 charges. Gains 1 charge each time an enemy hero dies within 1675 range. Each charge bestows 1 mana regeneration per second, reduces gold lost from death by 25, and reduces respawn time by 4 seconds. When the bearer dies, restores 400 HP + 30 HP per charge to allied units within 1675 units, then loses a third of its charges. While dead, the bearer continues to receive experience at the death location and gives 1800 unit vision there.

name: sphere
lore: This magical sphere once protected one of the most famous heroes in history.
attrib:
+ 15 All Attributes
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
+ 10 Damage
desc: Passive: Spellblock - Blocks most targeted spells once every 17 seconds.

name: vanguard
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: A powerful shield that defends its wielder from even the most vicious of attacks.
attrib:
+ 250 Health
+ 6 HP Regeneration
BLOCK CHANCE: 80%
RANGED BLOCK: 20
MELEE BLOCK: 40
desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

name: blade_mail
notes:
Damage Return is calculated after reductions.
Damage Return doesn't reflect damage from other Blademails.
Won't damage magic immune units.
lore: A razor-sharp coat of mail, it is the choice of selfless martyrs in combat.
attrib:
+ 22 Damage
+ 6 Armor
+ 10 Intelligence
desc: Active: Damage Return - Returns any damage you take to the unit that dealt the damage.  Lasts 4.5 seconds.

name: soul_booster
lore: Regain lost courage.
attrib:
+ 450 Health
+ 400 Mana
+ 4 HP Regeneration
+ 100% Mana Regeneration

name: hood_of_defiance
notes: Stacks multiplicatively with non-item sources of spell resistance.
lore: A furred, magic resistant headpiece that is feared by wizards.
attrib:
+ 8 HP Regeneration
+ 30% Spell Resistance
desc: Multiple instances of spell resistance from items do not stack.

name: rapier
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
attrib: + 300 Damage
desc: Drops on death.  Divine Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Divine Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.

name: monkey_king_bar
lore: A powerful staff used by a master warrior.
attrib:
+ 88 Damage
+ 15 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO MINI-BASH: 35%
MINI-BASH DAMAGE: 100
desc:
Passive: Mini-Bash - Gives a chance to minibash and deal bonus damage.
Passive: True Strike - Prevents your attacks from missing.

name: radiance
lore: A divine weapon that causes damage and a bright burning effect that lays waste to nearby enemies.
attrib:
+ 65 Damage
BURN DAMAGE: 50
desc:
Active: Toggles Burn Damage on or off.
Passive: Burn Damage - Deals damage per second in a 700 radius.

name: butterfly
notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of Evasion.
lore: Only the mightiest and most experienced of warriors can wield the Butterfly, but it provides incredible dexterity in combat.
attrib:
+ 30 Agility
+ 30 Damage
+ 35% Evasion
+ 30 Attack Speed

name: greater_crit
lore: A weapon of incredible power that is difficult for even the strongest of warriors to control.
attrib:
+ 81 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 25%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 240%
desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

name: basher
notes: Doesn't stack with other sources of bash.
lore: A feared weapon in the right hands, this maul's ability to shatter the defenses of its opponents should not be underestimated.
attrib:
+ 40 Damage
+ 6 Strength
MELEE CHANCE: 25%
RANGED CHANCE: 10%
desc: Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

name: bfury
notes:
Cleave damage is reduced by armor type but not by armor value.
Cleave damage goes through magic immunity.
lore: The bearer of this mighty axe gains the ability to cut down swaths of enemies at once.
attrib:
+ 65 Damage
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 150% Mana Regeneration
CLEAVE DAMAGE: 35%
desc: Passive: Cleave - Deals a percent of attack damage in a 250 AoE around the target. Ranged units cannot Cleave.

name: manta
notes:
Has a 0.1 second cast time upon which you are invulnerable.
Many effects are removed upon using Manta.
lore: An axe made of reflective materials that causes confusion amongst enemy ranks.
attrib:
+ 10 Strength
+ 26 Agility
+ 10 Intelligence
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
desc:
Active: Mirror Image - Creates 2 illusions of your hero that last 20 seconds.

Melee illusions deal 33% damage and take 250% bonus damage. Ranged illusions deal 28% damage and take 300% bonus damage.

Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

name: lesser_crit
lore: A blade forged from rare crystals, it seeks weak points in enemy armor.
attrib:
+ 30 Damage
CRITICAL CHANCE: 20%
CRITICAL DAMAGE: 175%
desc: Passive: Critical Strike - Grants a chance to deal critical damage on an attack.

name: armlet
notes:
Activation has a 2 second cooldown.
The strength change will affect both maximum and current HP, but you cannot die from the change.
lore: Weapon of choice among brutes, the bearer sacrifices his life energy to gain immense strength and power.
attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 5 Armor
+ 7 HP Regeneration
desc: Active: Unholy Strength - Gives +31 damage, +10 attack speed, and +25 strength while active, but drains 40 HP per second.  You cannot die from the health loss when the bonus strength is gone, or the health drain per second.

name: invis_sword
notes:
Has a 0.3 second fade time.
If the invisibility ends without attacking, the bonus damage is lost.
lore: The blade of a fallen king, it allows you to move unseen and strike from the shadows.
attrib:
+ 22 Damage
+ 30 Attack Speed
desc: Active: Shadow Walk - Makes you invisible until the duration ends, or until you attack or cast a spell.  While Shadow Walk is active, you move 20% faster and can move through units.  If attacking to break the invisibility, you gain 150 bonus damage on that attack.  Lasts 12 seconds.

name: sange_and_yasha
lore: Sange and Yasha, when attuned by the moonlight and used together, become a very powerful combination.
attrib:
MAIM CHANCE: 16%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 32%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 32
+ 16 Damage
+ 16 Strength
+ 16 Agility
+ 16 Attack Speed
+ 16% Movement Speed
desc:
Passive: Greater Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 5.0 seconds.

Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

name: satanic
lore: Immense power at the cost of your soul.
attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 25 Strength
+ 5 Armor
LIFESTEAL: 25%
desc:
Active: Unholy Rage - Increases Lifesteal by 175% for 3.5 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives Lifesteal on attacks.

Satanic is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifier.

name: mjollnir
notes:
Static Charge cannot trigger more than one per second.
Static Charge's lightning deals 200 magical damage, the damage source and secondary targets cannot be more than 900 range away, the 3 targets hit must be in a cone with 125 starting radius, 475 distance and 300 final radius.
lore: Thor's magical hammer, made for him by the dwarves Brok and Eitri.
attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 80 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO CHAIN: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 160
desc:
Active: Static Charge - Places a charged shield on a target unit
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance to release Chain Lighting on attack, dealing damage to multiple targets.

Mjollnir is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

name: skadi
notes: Lasts 5 seconds with melee Eye of Skadi, 3 seconds with ranged Eye of Skadi.
lore: Extremely rare artifact, guarded by the azure dragons.
attrib:
+ 25 All Attributes
+ 250 Health
+ 250 Mana
MOVE SLOW: 35%
ATTACK SLOW: 35
desc:
Passive: Cold Attack - Attacks slow the movement and attack speed of the target.

Eye of Skadi is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers. Eye of Skadi can be combined with Lifesteal Attack Modifiers.

name: sange
lore: Sange is an unusually accurate weapon, seeking weak points automatically.
attrib:
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
+ 10 Damage
+ 16 Strength
desc: Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.

name: helm_of_the_dominator
notes: Cannot dominate more than one unit at a time.  If a new unit is dominated, the old one will die.
lore: The powerful headpiece of a dead necromancer.
attrib:
+ 20 Damage
+ 5 Armor
LIFESTEAL: 15%
desc:
Active: Dominate - Take control of a non-hero, non-ancient target unit.
Passive: Lifesteal - Gives lifesteal on attacks.

Helm of the Dominator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: maelstrom
lore: A hammer forged for the gods themselves, Maelstrom allows its user to harness the power of lightning.
attrib:
+ 24 Damage
+ 25 Attack Speed
CHANCE TO CHAIN: 25%
CHAIN DAMAGE: 120
desc:
Passive: Chain Lightning - Grants a chance on attack to release a Chain Lightning that hits 4 targets, dealing damage.

Maelstrom is a Unique Attack Modifier that stacks with other Unique Attack Modifiers, but overrides them when Chain Lightning occurs.

name: desolator
notes: Armor reduction works on buildings.
lore: A wicked weapon, used in torturing political criminals.
attrib:
+ 60 Damage
ARMOR REDUCTION: 7
desc:
Passive: Corruption - Your attacks reduce target's armor for 15 seconds.

Desolator is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: yasha
lore: Yasha is regarded as the swiftest weapon ever created.
attrib:
+ 16 Agility
+ 15 Attack Speed
+ 10% Movement Speed
desc: Percentage based movement speed bonuses from multiple items do not stack.

name: mask_of_madness
lore: Once this mask is worn, it's bearer becomes an uncontrollable aggressive force.
attrib: LIFESTEAL: 20%
desc:
Active: Berserk - Gives 100 attack speed and 30% movement speed but causes you to take extra 30% damage. Lasts 12 seconds.
Passive: Lifesteal - Grants lifesteal on attacks.

Mask of Madness is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: diffusal_blade
notes:
Instantly kills summoned units.
Slow lasts 4 seconds.
lore: An enchanted blade that allows the user to cut straight into the enemy's soul.
attrib:
+ 25/30 Agility
+ 6/10 Intelligence
desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.

Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: ethereal_blade
notes:
Shares cooldown with Ghost Scepter.
Ethereal units take 40% bonus magic damage.
Lasts an extra second on Self or Allied cast.
lore: A flickering blade of a ghastly nature, it is capable of dealing damage in both magical and physical planes.
attrib:
+ 40 Agility
+ 10 Strength
+ 10 Intelligence
ENEMY DURATION: 3
ALLY/SELF DURATION: 4
desc: Active: Ether Blast - Converts you and your target into ethereal form. Target unit is slowed and cannot attack or be attacked, and takes 2.0x of your primary attribute + 75 as damage.

name: soul_ring
notes: If the mana gain cannot fit in your mana pool, it creates a buffer of mana that is used before your mana pool.  If this mana is not used before the duration, the extra mana is lost.
lore: A ring that feeds on the souls of those around it.
attrib:
+ 3 HP Regeneration
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
desc: Active: Sacrifice - Consume 150 HP to temporarily gain 150 Mana.  Lasts 10 seconds.

name: arcane_boots
notes: Does not work on Meepo clones.
lore: Magi equipped with these boots are valued in battle.
attrib:
+ 55 Movement Speed
+ 250 Mana
MANA RESTORED: 135
desc:
Active: Replenish Mana - Restores mana in an area around the hero.

Flat movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of boots do not stack.

name: orb_of_venom
lore: Envenoms your veapon with the venom of a venomous viper.
attrib:
MELEE SLOW: 12%
RANGED SLOW: 4%
DURATION: 4
POISON DAMAGE: 3
desc:
Passive: Poison Attack - Poisons the target, dealing damage over time and slowing, depending on whether your hero is melee or ranged.

Orb of Venom is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: stout_shield
notes: Multiple sources of damage block don't stack.
lore: One man's wine barrel bottom is another man's shield.
attrib:
MELEE BLOCK: 20
RANGED BLOCK: 10
BLOCK CHANCE: 60%
desc: Passive: Damage Block - Gives a chance to block damage, depending on the type of hero you are.

name: ancient_janggo
lore: A relic that enchants the bodies of those around it for swifter movement in times of crisis.
attrib:
+ 9 All Attributes
+ 3 Damage
AURA ATTACK SPEED: 5
AURA MOVE SPEED: 5%
desc:
Active: Endurance - Gives bonus +10 attack speed and +10% movement speed to surrounding allies.
Passive: Swiftness Aura - Gives bonus attack and movement speed to surrounding allies.

Multiple instances of Swiftness Aura do not stack.

name: medallion_of_courage
lore: The bearer has no fear of combat.
attrib:
+ 6 Armor
+ 50% Mana Regeneration
ARMOR REDUCTION: 6
desc: Active: Valor - Reduces the armor of you and your target. Lasts 7 seconds.

name: smoke_of_deceit
attrib:
BONUS SPEED: 15%
DURATION: 35
desc: Use: Upon activation, the user and all nearby allied player-controlled units gain invisiblity and bonus movement speed for a brief time.  Minimap icons will also be hidden.  Upon moving within 1025 range of an enemy hero or tower, the invisibility is lost.

name: veil_of_discord
lore: The headwear of corrupt magi.
attrib:
RADIUS: 600
BONUS MAGIC DAMAGE: 25%
+ 6 HP Regeneration
+ 6 Intelligence
+ 6 Strength
+ 6 Agility
+ 6 Damage
+ 6 Armor
desc: Active: Magic Weakness - Emits a weakening blast that increases the magic damage enemies take. Lasts 25.0 seconds.

name: necronomicon_2
lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
attrib:
+ 15/21/24 Intelligence
+ 8/12/16 Strength
desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.

name: necronomicon_3
lore: Considered the holy grail of necromancy and demonology, a powerful malefic force is locked within its pages.
attrib:
+ 15/21/24 Intelligence
+ 8/12/16 Strength
desc: Active: Demonic Summoning - Summons a Necronomicon Warrior and a Necronomicon Archer to fight for you.  Their strength and abilities increase as Necronomicon increases in level.  Lasts 40 seconds.

desc:
Active: Purge - Purges a target unit, removing buffs, slowing, and dealing damage if it is a summoned unit.
Passive: Feedback - Your attacks burn 20/36 mana and deal the same amount in physical damage. Upgradable.

Diffusal Blade is a Unique Attack Modifier, and does not stack with other Unique Attack Modifiers.

name: dagon_2
lore: A lesser wand that grows in power the longer it is used, it brings magic to the fingertips of the user.
attrib:
+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

+ 13/15/17/19/21 Intelligence

BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

+ 3 All Attributes
+ 9 Damage
BURST DAMAGE: 400/500/600/700/800
desc: Active: Energy Burst - Burst of damage to target enemy unit. Upgradable.

name: rod_of_atos
lore: Atos, the Lord of Blight, has his essence stored in this deceptively simple wand.
attrib:
+ 25 Intelligence
+ 350 Health
CRIPPLE SLOW: 60%
DURATION: 4
desc: Active: Cripple - Slows the target's movement speed.

name: abyssal_blade
notes:
The stun is melee range.
Doesn't stack with other bashes.
lore: The lost blade of the Commander of the Abyss, this edge cuts into an enemy's soul.
attrib:
+ 100 Damage
+ 10 Strength
MELEE CHANCE: 25%
RANGED CHANCE: 10%
desc: Active: Stun a target enemy unit for 2.0 seconds. Goes through Magic Immunity. Passive: Bash - Gives a chance to stun for 1.4 seconds.

name: heavens_halberd
notes: The disarm effect cannot be purged.
lore: This halberd moves with the speed of a smaller weapon, allowing the bearer to win duels that a heavy edge would not.
attrib:
+ 25% Evasion
MAIM CHANCE: 15%
MAIM MOVEMENT SLOW: 20%
MAIM ATTACK SLOW: 20
+ 25 Damage
+ 20 Strength
desc:
Active: Disarms the target for 4.5 seconds. Lasts 3.0 on Melee targets.
Passive: Lesser Maim - Gives a chance on attack to slow movement speed for 4.0 seconds.

name: ring_of_aquila
notes: Does not stack with armor auras from Ring of Basilius, Ring of Aquila, or Vladmir's Offering.
lore: The ring of the fallen Warlord Aquila continues to support armies in battle.
attrib:
+ 9 Damage
+ 3 All Attributes
+ 6 Agility
+ 1 Armor
AURA MANA REGEN: 0.65
AURA BONUS ARMOR: 2
desc:
Passive: Aquila Aura - Grants mana regeneration and armor in a 900 AoE.
Active: Toggle whether the aura affects other non-hero units.

Multiple instances of Aquila Aura do not stack.

name: tranquil_boots
lore: While they increase the longevity of the wearer, this boot is not particularly reliable.
attrib:
+ 90 Movement Speed
+ 4 Armor
+ 12 HP Regeneration
desc: Passive: Break - Whenever you attack or get attacked you lose the HP regeneration and 30 Movement Speed for 13 seconds.

name: shadow_amulet
attrib: + 30 Attack Speed
desc: Active: Fade - Grants invisibility to you or target allied hero over 1.5 seconds. Moving breaks the invisibility. There is no cooldown when using this item on yourself.

name: halloween_candy_corn
lore: A strange looking candy, made out of Greevil cream and gummy vitamins.
desc: Use: Eat the candy to gain a permanent bonus to your stats, equal to your hero's natural stat gain.  Greevil Treats also give 500 XP.

name: mystery_hook
desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

name: mystery_arrow
desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

name: mystery_missile
desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target enemy unit.

name: mystery_toss
desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target unit.

name: mystery_vacuum
desc: Use: Uses the mystery spell on a target point.

name: halloween_rapier
lore: So powerful, it cannot have a single owner.
desc: Drops on death.  Cursed Rapier is muted to anyone but the owner, as long as he or his teammates pick it up. As soon as an enemy picks it up, Cursed Rapier is unmuted, but cannot be dropped except on death.  Cursed Rapier gives vision of its bearer to all enemy heroes  Each time Cursed Rapier gets a kill for its owner, it loses 100 damage.
